text: Bertha's tree frog (Dendropsophus berthalutzae) is a frog that lives in Brazil. It lives on the east coast of the country, not far from the Atlantic Ocean. This frog lays eggs on leaves over bodies of water. When the tadpoles hatch from their eggs, they fall off the leaf into the water. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Bertha's tree frog
